description:
youngest son of Jacob, so called by him, but by Rachel, the mother, who died at Benjamin's birth,
    called 
בֶּןאֿוֺנִי
 (q. v.) Gen
        35:18 own brother of Joseph Gen 35:24; Gen 42:4; Gen 43:29; Gen 45:12 compare Gen 42:36; Gen 45:15;
    
Gen 45:34 +;
    name of tribe of Benjamin 
        Num 1:11; 
        Deut 27:12; Deut 33:12; Judg 5:14 + 23 t. Judges; 32 t. Samuel Kings Chronicles; Hos 5:8; Ezek 48:23; Obad 1:19; Ps 68:28; Ps 80:3
בְּנֵי בנימן (literal Gen 46:21) of tribe Num 1:36; Num 2:22; Num 7:60; Num 26:38; Num 26:41; Josh 18:20; Josh 18:28; Judg 20:3; Judg 20:14; Judg 20:15; Judg 20:18; Judg 20:21; Judg 20:23; Judg 20:24; Judg 20:28; Judg 20:30; Judg 20:31; Judg 20:32; Judg 20:36; Judg 20:48; Judg 21:18; Judg 21:20; Judg 21:23; 2Sam 2:25; 2Sam 4:2; 2Sam 23:29; 1Chr 8:40; 1Chr 9:3; 1Chr 9:7; 1Chr 11:31; 1Chr 12:17; 1Chr 12:30; Neh 11:4; Neh 11:7; Neh 11:31; Jer 6:1; Judg 1:21 (twice in verse) (but בני יהודה
     in || Josh
        15:63 compare BuRS 7); explicitly מַטֵּה
        בִנְיָמִן
Num 1:37; Num 2:22; Num 13:9; Num 34:21; Josh 21:4; 1Chr 6:45 compare
    Josh 21:17
מַטֵּה
׳
בְנֵי ב
Num 10:24; Josh 18:11; Josh 18:21; 1Chr 6:50
׳
שֵׁבֶט ב
1Sam 10:20;
    1Sam 10:21;
    1Kgs 12:21
    observe also ׳
כָּלשִֿׁבְטֵי ב
Judg 20:12
    compare 1Sam 9:21
אִישׁ בִּנְיָמִן
Judg 20:41;
    1Sam 4:12 compare
    אִישׁ
מִבִּןיָֿ֯מִין
1Sam 9:1
אֶרֶץ בִּנְיָמִן
Judg 21:21;
    1Sam 9:16; 2Sam 21:14;
    Jer 1:1; Jer 17:26; Jer 32:44; Jer 33:13; Jer 37:12
    compare Jer 32:8
׳
גְּבוּל ב
1Sam 10:2; Ezek 48:22
    (strike out Co) Ezek 48:24
בֵּית בִּנְיָמִן
2Sam 3:19
בֵּית
׳
יְהוּדָה וּב
1Kgs 12:23;
    2Chr 11:1 in name
    of a temple-gate הָעֶלְיוֺן
׳
שַׁעַר ב
Jer 20:2 compare
    Jer 37:13;
    Jer 38:7; Ezek 48:32;
    Zech 14:10.
